title: Sweet potato peanut soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons minced fresh root ginger', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch ground cloves', '3 medium tomatoes, chopped', '2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and chopped', '1 carrot, peeled and chopped', '1 litre water', '1 teaspoon salt', '40g chopped, unsalted peanuts', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons creamy peanut butter', 'Freshly chopped coriander']
